edu.gmu.swe.taf

Class XMLManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gmu.swe.taf.XMLManipulator

  • public class XMLManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class provides methods to manipulate XML files such as creating a new XML file, inserting a new node, deleting a node, and searching a node. In this class, a node is a mapping.
    Version:
    1.0 Nov 12, 2012
    Author:
    Nan Li
